But revisionists contend that most of those battles were his to lose, given the technical superiority of the army he commanded.UK Throughout my political life, I have been a Labour revisionist or, as it is now called, a moderniser. The revisionists embraced the primacy of socioeconomic forces in the 1970s and 1980s just as their reductionist dangers were becoming clear in the study of Western revolutions.
